channel.title: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
channel.description:
Hey guys i recently bought a VPS from DREAMHOST and i need help setting it up with my server so people can connect, can someone please help me,
ive never used a vps so i dont know how it works ive searched every where looking for help but it doesnt work, please help me guys if u have teamviewer or skype ill be glad to add you so you can help me! it would be awesome. thank you so much!

item.title: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

What you’ve done is the equivalence of me giving you a text book, and telling you to study it over the night, and then tell you to take a test about it the next day… You simply don’t know enough about the Linux OS to be using it to host your server. My advice would be cancel your subscription, and take some time to learn how to use the Linux OS.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows

item.title: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
item.dc:creator: @Final_Form Final Form
item.description:
@Final_Form wrote:

I probably will cancel it, but is there anyway I can get some help with it?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows

item.title: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Final Form, post:3, topic:553185”]the Host is linux based, and i know the main things about a vps such as what it does but starting it up and all i have no idea, ive tried portforwarding to my local host but my provider couldnt even help me…[/quote]you sound like you’re in way over your head. why would you buy a technical product if you don’t even have a vague idea about how to use it? cancel your subscription and go learn some linux and networking basics.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows

item.title: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
item.dc:creator: @Final_Form Final Form
item.description:
@Final_Form wrote:

the Host is linux based, and i know the main things about a vps such as what it does but starting it up and all i have no idea, ive tried portforwarding to my local host but my provider couldnt even help me…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows

item.title: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

If you don’t know what a VPS is, why did you buy it?

Google ‘Putty’ if it’s a Linux based or if it’s windows Remote Desktop should work fine.
Alternatively, contact your provider - they’ll help you get setup and ready to go!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Setting up VPS ON windows
